text: My quick beauty tip is always have a tinted gloss of some kind to give you some color even if you have no makeup on.
author: Rachel Bilson

text: I think beauty comes from within, and society paints a ridiculous picture.
author: Rachel Bilson

text: My daily beauty regimen consists of washing my face before bed and putting on moisturizer.
author: Rachel Bilson

text: My unusual beauty tip is that I often use Vaseline to take my make up off. It works great and is good for sensitive skin.
author: Rachel Bilson

text: I envy the sensibility in Europe, appreciating beauty in women as they age. I'm going to go that way. I might dye my gray hair for a bit, but beyond that the buck stops. I'm not having any work done.
author: Rachel Bilson
